csheets.ext.comments

Class CommentableCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • csheets.ext.CellExtension
      • csheets.ext.comments.CommentableCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cell, CellListener, Extensible<Cell>, Serializable, Comparable<Cell>, EventListener

    public class CommentableCell
extends CellExtension
    An extension of a cell in a spreadsheet, with support for comments.
    Author:
    Alexandre Braganca, Einar Pehrson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentableCell(Cell cell)
      Creates a comentable cell extension for the given cell.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserComment

        public String getUserComment()
        Get the cell's user comment.
        Returns:
        The user supplied comment for the cell or null if no user supplied comment exists.

      • hasComment

        public boolean hasComment()
        Returns whether the cell has a comment.
        Returns:
        true if the cell has a comment

      • setUserComment

        public void setUserComment(String comment)
        Sets the user-specified comment for the cell.
        Parameters:
        comment - the user-specified comment

      • addCommentableCellListener

        public void addCommentableCellListener(CommentableCellListener listener)
        Registers the given listener on the cell.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be added

      • removeCommentableCellListener

        public void removeCommentableCellListener(CommentableCellListener listener)
        Removes the given listener from the cell.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be removed

      • fireCommentsChanged

        protected void fireCommentsChanged()
        Notifies all registered listeners that the cell's comments changed.
